name: panik-overlay
description: Webbapp med barnläge och familjeläge för Panikknappen

scripts.check: node -e "const fs=require('fs');['index.html','assets/css/portal.css','assets/vendor/gsap.min.js','apps/child/index.html','apps/child/style.css','apps/child/script.js','apps/family/index.html','apps/family/style.css','apps/family/script.js','assets/js/family-lock.js','server/api-server.js','data/incidents.json','data/push-subscriptions.json'].forEach(f=>{if(!fs.existsSync(f)){throw new Error('Saknar fil: '+f)}}); console.log('OK: appstruktur finns');"
